summary: Increases the sweet spot on higher level locks by a substantial amount but not enough to trivialize them at lower levels of lockpicking.
descriptionHtml:
Increases the sweet spot on higher level locks by a substantial amount but not enough to trivialize them at lower levels of lockpicking.

see screenshots. Blue is the part of the lock that will open.

Lite version (roughly half strength) avail under downloads. Please only use one version.

NOTE: THE BAR ON THE SCREENSHOT IS A SEPARATE ADDON NOT INCLUDED IN THIS OR ASSOCIATED WITH ME IN ANY WAY. IT IS ONLY INCLUDED IN THE SCREENSHOTS FOR COMPARISON PURPOSES, AS IT DISPLAYS THE DATA OF INTEREST IN A CLEAR AND UNDERSTANDABLE FASHION NOT OTHERWISE POSSIBLE.

Check out my other mods:
alchemy levels faster: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1108
level curve rebalance: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1094
more powerful potions: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=926
author: tmonet
